b'Anime Roukyoku Kikou Shimizu no Jiroch: b"A story based on Shimizu no Jirochou, an early yakuza who specialized in gambling and maritime transport.\n\nThe anime is composed of 10 stories. Each story was told over 3 episodes. The particular tale is based on Hirosawa Torazo II's telling; Hirosawa is a roukyoku/naniwabushi."
